inference:
Area of the shaded region 
$$=\text{area of large semicircle}-\text{area of three smaller semicircles}$$

$$=\left(\frac{1}{2}\cdot\pi\cdot 2^2\right)-3\left(\frac{1}{2}\cdot\pi\cdot1^2\right)$$

$$=\left(2\pi\right)-3\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)$$

$$=2\pi-\frac{3\pi}{2}$$

$$=\frac{4\pi-3\pi}{2}$$

$$=\frac{\pi}{2}$$

$$\therefore\space\text{Required area}=\frac{\pi}{2}\text{ sq. units}$$

$$\text{Final Answer: }\boxed{\frac{\pi}{2}}.\space\text{I hope it is correct.}$$
